root: ^A lot of things happened these days.
^Things that I would never imagine to happen to me before.
^But those people…those I met, or I knew before, were found so ridiculous.
^Maybe they are successful in common view, but they were so immersed in their own emotions and attitudes.
^Even use their extreme sentiments to justify their horrible behaviors.
^Aren’t they more ridiculous than what I was before?
^“All of these emotions, so worthless and useless.”
^“my boss, doctor, S, and chief. They thought they could do anything they wanted because of their desires.”
^“what kind of a life needs to live?”
^“I used to work hard on my ass to get everything down. Hoping for better chances. Bearing every insult. But what does the world pay me?”
^"I only wish I can scream harsh enough to be heard.”
^"a drink, to extinguish the fire in my heart.”
^“Well, the wine slows my thinking…I should get some sleep…”
^“what is this flame or the burn in my heart?”
^again, the feeling of darkness, emptiness, and powerlessness
^*there is a bulb of light rising from the darkness*
^“is that me again. “I” is coming to me. Now, I am shaking.”
^“Well, well, well. You just can't obey what people say, don’t you?”
^“What makes you think you can step into this enchantment of mine? ”
^“Huh, there is something different about you.”
^“But still, still a boring ass of yourself. With nothing to hold, and nothing to use.”
^“they just like you, no, you are a combination of them.”
^“your pride, your wrath, your lust, and your gluttony… a monster builds from those.”
^“What a pitiful world where humans can only mourn for their desires.”
